name: Isolation in the Forest VR: A Nightmare Reality
name_original: Isolation in the Forest VR: A Nightmare Reality
description:
Survive a horror nightmare in VR, stranded in a forest facing unknown dangers. Can you make it out alive? Isolation in the Forest VR

In this game, the player is stranded alone in a dark and dangerous forest, surrounded by hostile creatures that constantly attack. The only equipment the player has to defend themselves is a flashlight, a rifle and an axe. Using these items, the player must fight against the creatures to obtain their meat and store it in their shack.

The gameplay in this game is truly exciting, as the player must be cunning and quick to survive. The flashlight is essential for seeing in the dark, but it also attracts creatures. The rifle is useful for keeping creatures at bay, but it has a limited amount of ammunition. Lastly, the axe is the only way to obtain meat from the creatures, but it is also noisy and attracts more creatures.

Objetive:

The objective of the game is to survive in the dark and dangerous forest, where the player is constantly being attacked by hostile creatures. The player must use the flashlight, rifle, and axe to fend off the creatures and gather their meat to store in the shack. The ultimate goal is to survive for as long as possible and gather enough resources to escape the forest.
